transcript: when I was selling weight loss memberships way back in the day you know a lady would come sit down and say you know um I haven't worked out in 7 years and I I know I need to be going to the gym and I would say that's amazing they would just be shocked what do you mean i' be like you're so consistent so you already have the tra of consistency I was like we just have to flip it and they were like never thought about it like that for me I just wanted this person to believe they could do it and so I think to the same degree it's like well if every day you didn't make 100 reach outs or you didn't make the piece of content that you wanted to but up until that point you've always like been able to like make a couple coffee sit down at the computer rather than playing video games it's counting the wins sometimes of of losses that didn't happen
